lender.name: Holy Names University
lender.loan_because: We chose to pool our money and loan it instead of buying gifts for a holiday gift exchange each year. We hope this can continue as a tradition in our office. This is our second year of lending.
lender.occupational_info: We are a university admissions office. Together, we work to enroll students to study at our university.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it's something I like to do, and its the right thing to do as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance Lawrence, KS web designer who works with small companies on their online marketing efforts.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I can help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of a community based charitable organization.

lender.name: DOREEN
lender.loan_because: I Can
lender.occupational_info: I run the office for my husband and his business partner. Pay bills, get supplies, answer phones, all things that must be done to keep the office running smoothly.

lender.name: Lilly Foundation
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I usually pick a region I have been to or a business which strikes a chord.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to live a secure life, and to have always been able to provide food, shelter and education to my family. And because, in the words of Kev Carmody, Aboriginal singer/songwriter: "From little things big things grow". http://www.kevcarmody.com.au/tracks/messages.html#fromlittlethings

lender.name: Peregrin
lender.loan_because: I have needed help.

lender.name: Farrah
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Vegan Deisy
lender.loan_because: I want women to succeed.

lender.name: JulieF202
lender.loan_because: I love helping people who are trying to help themselves. It gives me such great pleasure to browse the possible loans and select some.
lender.occupational_info: 1) support governments' development projects and their public sector reform efforts, and 2) conduct academic research and writing.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want people to improve their lives and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I research mental health.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help enrich the lives of others around me, and around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach women how to look and feel good, while providing quality beauty products at affordable prices. Because I help women, it ripples out from them to their husbands and children, extended family and friends - on and on, hopefully touching many, many lives.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the countries I have visited.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand in making their dreams happen. I am grateful for the help I received along the way and I consider it an honor to be able to help others reach their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I'm the lucky one who gets to live in privilege. To whom much has been given, much is required.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to help women to help their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an income support agency.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I've traveled to Cambodia and Guatemala and met some amazing entrepreneurs. These people have truly inspired me to share everything that I have. Kiva is amazing for facilitating this connection between cultures and countries!
lender.occupational_info: Student at Emory University

lender.name: Courtney Senna
lender.loan_because: You're never too small to make a difference!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Over the course of my life many people have given me a helping hand in business. I do business in India and have seen the effectiveness of Micro-Loans first hand. This program is a great way to get involved.
lender.occupational_info: I import motorcycles and motorcycle parts from India and sell them to motorcycles dealers in the USA.

lender.name: andy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I pretend to be someone/something I am not, and people pay money to see it.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I've been given a lot by default. Isn't it only right that I give some of that back?
lender.occupational_info: I review web products for a college marketing firm.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Emergency Medical Services, Firefighting, and Radiology Technologist.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is every persons responsibility to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am student searching for what I should do with my life

lender.name: Rick & Erin
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Howden
lender.loan_because: For Christmas 2008, Kiva seemed liike a good option for giving something back.
lender.occupational_info: We are an extended family living in Auckland, New Zealand

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I belive this works, and I know where the money goes.

lender.name: Alia
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high students who are having a hard time, focusing on individual one-on-one attention.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself, and I am very supportive of others who do the same. Giving someone less fortunate the chance to work for themselves, and have a better life, seems like a just cause. :)
lender.occupational_info: I make mascot costumes for schools, performers, or theaters. They are made by hand, and every one is different. I also help my customers become better performers.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to make good things happen.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to understand why people buy things, so that I can make sure we produce products that people really want.

lender.name: Ulla
lender.loan_because: this way I can help more people by lending the same money over and over again.

lender.name: Wilcox Family
lender.loan_because: Our money goes out To Heal, To Bless and To Prosper. It is evidence of our faith and belief. It does good work in the world and returns to us multiplied abundantly.

lender.name: Brian & Takami
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping others achieve their financial independence

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-finance as a very effective way to assist others around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I help people find and better understand their ancestors and family.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I'm privileged to be able to.

lender.name: Snorre
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jeroen
lender.loan_because: I believe the most sustainable way of supporting people is to help local initiatives that empower people to improve their situation and become self-supportive.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help: It makes the people help themselves

lender.name: Tore
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people to help themselves :-)

lender.name: Franklin
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do. Giving someone hope and a brighter future is the least we can do.We need to put more trust in those in need.
"We are a nation of many nationalities, many races, many religions--bound together by a single unity, the unity of freedom and equality. Whoever seeks to set one nationality against another, seeks to degrade all nationalities" Franklin Delano Roosevelt
lender.occupational_info: I work with persons with both physical and mental disabilities in helping them re-enter the world of work in order to foster independence

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I wish to serve others. Blessings to everyone here to help!

lender.name: Stian
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way of helping other people help themselves.

lender.name: Rong-Bang
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am a great listener who deals with people's psychological problems.

lender.name: Shin-Bei
lender.loan_because: I want to help more and more people!( ) ( ) (Oo) (")(")

lender.name: oven
lender.loan_because: I've got money to spare

lender.name: Lars ge
lender.loan_because: I believe it's the best way of helping poor people; someone that wants to help themselves, are the best to help them.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I like to encourage entrepreneurship and self-sufficiency

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get ready for surgery and then wake them up after surgery.

lender.name: John & Nellie
lender.loan_because: we are able to do so and we have become convinced that KIVA improves the lives of many poor people who are working hard to provide for their families. We like that KIVA "gives a hand up, not a hand out".
lender.occupational_info: John is a retired scientist who had a 30 year career in marine biology and had the opportunity to travel to many places in the world. Nellie is a homemaker and care giver who enjoys travel and is aware of the needs of others.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to be able to help families to themselves and to create a future for their children or other loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: Personal publicist who supports people to produce, self promote and manage a personal brand

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in America, and with good health.
lender.occupational_info: Hard working, loving husband, & dog lover. Entrepreneur, Squidoo enthusiast, & blogger. Do you like YouTube? You're going to love TubeTilla Pro. TubeTilla Pro enables you to download YouTube videos in popular formats.

lender.name: Hal and Margie
lender.loan_because: We think this is a great way to help others to help themselves. We are excited to do our small part in making this a better, friendlier world.
lender.occupational_info: Hal is a drama instructor at a nearby private school, and Margie is an executive assistant at a commercial real estate firm in Chicago.

lender.name: tony
lender.loan_because: Free Lender resource. Submit your business for free.
lender.occupational_info: Free Online Advertising

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: this is the coolest organization ever.

lender.name: Saskia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of people around the world, especially other entrepreneurs like me!
lender.occupational_info: I am business owner and entrepreneur

lender.name: ALEC SCHOLARSHIP FUND
lender.loan_because: The urgent needs of poor and needy people.
lender.occupational_info: Compassionate and the Voice of the Voiceless.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's wrong for us Americans not to!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: i'm always amazed at the amount of lasting good that can be done for the equivalent cost of lunch at an American restaurant.

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: In this part of the world we have so much in abundance. I think we need to share what we can, in a small or bigger way what ever is possible for each of us individually, to make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Trialoffice of te Comprehancive Cancer Center East. We coordinate cancer clinical trials form start to finish (logistic, administrative, datacollection and analysis). I am a trialcoordinator. For the principle investigator I handle the submission of the trial to the Ethics Committee and process all kinds of administrative actions to make all departments ready and get the trial started.

lender.name: Mavis
lender.loan_because: I want to share hope, opportunity and blessings with those who have less of it than I have. They just want a helping hand not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired special education teacher.

lender.name: Mathilde
lender.occupational_info: Helping international companies to set up websites, writing texts.

lender.name: Pim Engels
lender.occupation: Student MSc Economics at the Tilburg University
lender.loan_because: I have seen and believe in the social and economic development that microfinance brings to the poor and 'unbankable'.
lender.occupational_info:
My name is Pim Engels, and I am currently finishing the master programme Economics: Growth, Development and Resources, at the Tilburg University, in The Netherlands.
From November 2007 till February 2008 I have interned with Grameen Bank in Bangladesh. I have seen and experienced all the operating activities of Grameen Bank, and have met with Muhammad Yunus.
At this point, I am interning with ING Microfinance, in The Netherlands. I will be writing my thesis on the relation between social and financial performance of MFIs.

lender.name: Csaba
lender.loan_because: I do penance.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I want to be a small business owner myself one day.

lender.name: burt hoovis
lender.loan_because: Nothing in the history of the world has brought more good things into more people's lives than businesses working to serve their customers...and businesses need access to capital to function.

lender.name: Sanjeev
lender.loan_because: I Love People
lender.occupational_info: Pass it on...

lender.name: Lyndsay
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see women have access to funds to help their business grow.
lender.occupational_info: I teach basic business principles to university students.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives me the opportunity to positvely impact the lives of others

lender.name: JKP1375
lender.loan_because:
I've experienced times when I just needed a little help to greatly improve my world.
It's now my time to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Art, Antique and Unique Collectibles Shop

lender.name: Bradford
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of empowering people to stand on their own.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to recognize their own thoughts and feelings so they can realize when those thoughts and feelings could lead to breaking the law. Hopefully, this understanding will cause them to do something different.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and in the pursuit to have a fully satisfying and rewarding life. I believe in supporting anyone's desire to create and contribute. Finally, it is my joy as a Christian to share with others the blessings God has provided to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company make plans to expand and improve our business.

lender.name: laurence
lender.loan_because: I have read about it in the journal "le monde", which is a french journal. And I have found it a very good idea and very easy to try.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I've always been an entrepreneur myself having been self-employed most of my life and I really want to help people less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I sell health and life insurance policies to individuals to protect their assets if they were to experience a serious illness or die prematurely.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to find a way I could help others, but was a single parent and poor for a long time. Now I have a good job, my son is grown, and I feel I can reach out. It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to make traditional art objects. We do mask-making, bead, make books, make pottery, quilt, weave, and make metal jewelry. We learn about other countries and how they make traditional art.

lender.name: Anna
lender.occupational_info:
I strive to understand the realities of others and how I can contribute to positive change in the world.
Trato de entender mejor las realidades del mundo y como puedo contribuir a cambios positivos.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Never be lacking in zeal, but keep your spiritual fervor, serving the Lord. Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer. Share with God's people who are in need. Practice hospitality. Romans 12:11-13

lender.name: Kre
lender.loan_because: I do think that this creates opportunity to to alleviate people out of poverty and it helps to improve communities. I also think lending money to someone obliged to pay back a loan is a far more efficient way of helping. It commits people (the one who loans) to strive for success. A small loan could make a big change for someone whom otherwise would be excluded in getting capital to create a future for him/her-self.

lender.name: kaden
lender.loan_because: I loan because it seems like the best possible way to help people all around the world, and see what other people are doing all around the world.

lender.name: Garrick & Angelika
lender.loan_because: it is good to share
lender.occupational_info: Construction Mgmt & Christian Charity

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: it gives people the chance to help themselves and feel good about making it.

lender.name: ArchFluffy
lender.loan_because: I have an entrepreneurial spirit myself. I tried to help launch a company here in the U.S.A. but it all went to pieces and cost a fortune. Maybe I can help someone else where a small investment on my part can mean a dream come true where he or she is. The skys the limit!
lender.occupational_info: I look after the health of a company the same way a doctor looks after the health of people.

lender.name: Terje (No US loans)
lender.loan_because:
It seems like a good thing to do.
Please join the Unhappy Kiva lenders team: www.kiva.org/community/viewTeam?team_id=7326
lender.occupational_info: I help people with computer solutions.

lender.name: Zac
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: Giving to those in need.

lender.name: Margret
lender.loan_because: There is more happiness in giving...
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and help clients with their taxes.

lender.name: John, Stacy & Molly
lender.loan_because: We think people should have the opportunity to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info:
John is the captain of the Kiva business community team...
"Friends of PackagingARTS Legacy Giving Fund"
Please support our team!

lender.name: Eva Christine
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others. I like the idea behind Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: Literary agent.

lender.name: Rean
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner, and I know how important small amounts of capital can be.
lender.occupational_info:
I help women giving birth. I walk with them, breathe with them, rub their back, and help them understand what the doctor or midwife is saying. I help them feel brave and strong so they will become confident mothers.
I also teach families about childbirth, breastfeeding, and life with a new baby.

lender.name: Jan Erik
lender.loan_because: Supporting microcredit is a fine way to express solidarity and to incite empowerment of people.

lender.name: Esther-Marie
lender.loan_because: it's a great way of giving gifts to people who already have everything and more than they need. I get to give a gift and help a budding entrepreneur out all at the same time! Does it get any better than that??
lender.occupational_info: I work in hospitality as a Guest Relations Manager; that means that I am responsible for taking care of all our guests, ensuring that they are satisfied with their stay at our hotel. I'm also responsible for the property itself, ensuring that everything runs smoothly during my shift, and that the teams on duty are also looked after.

lender.name: Jostein
lender.loan_because: I have been so lucky being born into a part of the world where material wealth is practically a bithright. The least I can do is to lend some of that wealth to people less lucky than me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small webdevelopment firm which mainly focus on non-comercial customers.

lender.name: Baker
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I sell art.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Microfinance, and Kiva's model in particular, is such a powerful tool for improving people's lives and building global as well as local community.
lender.occupational_info: I help undergraduate students negotiate the university and figure out what they want to study and do after they graduate.

lender.name: Mikael
lender.loan_because: I want to give something back and I think microcredits is the right way to go in many situations to get people out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with helping companies improve their productivity through strategic and operational actions.

lender.name: Jean
lender.occupational_info: I help small children who have trouble speaking

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: there is a need.....
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology Security

lender.name: Kanval and Ian
lender.loan_because: It was my brother's favorite charity. He passed away last year so I do it to honour his memory.

lender.name: Steve and Pollie
lender.loan_because: I frequently hear the line that "one person can't make a difference" and KIVA is just one way to prove that mode of thinking wrong. We have been blessed by having everything we need and then some. Giving back is not only an expression of gratitude for those blessings but it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job I have ever had in my entire life. I teach in a community college and it allows me the opportunity to give back every day.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have a good job so I can provide for my family. I want to do what I can to help other people to improve the lives of their own families.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer systems.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make a big difference!

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: Being self employeed impowers people
lender.occupational_info: I meet with wine makers or vineyard owners all over the world and then try to market their products to restaurants and retail stores in Southern California

lender.name: Katherine
lender.occupation: Student of Oyster River High Scool

lender.name: A.J.
lender.loan_because: we need to co-exist.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be able to sleep at night if I didn't.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a first-year college student. Although I am not yet sure of what I want to specialize in, I really enjoy doing studio art, reading french, and philosophy. On campus, I am involved with Students for a Democratic Society and a small group advocating to create a co-operative living space for students.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: It is nice to be able to help those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Former sales and marketing exec and entrepenuer...now world traveler

lender.name: YSE
lender.loan_because: Why not ?

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to make a good living, and that people everywhere deserve a chance to help people reach that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I have been retired since 2001, but feel blessed to have been able to work and help support my family. I would like to share this blessing with as many people as I can.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I run The Global Corner, an organization that teaches American children about different countries around the world.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because:
I know that the money I'm lending is helping the borrower in ways that I will probably never know, or experience. $25 may help her business enough that her kids can go to school, or enough that she can afford to put a solid floor in her house, or enough that she can employ another person and affect THEIR life.
I also like investing money, and participating in community service. I believe that this site gives me the best of both worlds.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently enrolled in High School, however, once i complete high school, i plan to attend a 4 year college and possibly go on to pre-medical school, and eventually medical school.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their dreams and potential.

lender.name: Tim
lender.occupational_info: I design and build complex systems involving software and networks (mostly narrowband RF networks).

lender.name: Levin Family
lender.loan_because: Our Father inspires us to help others. In honour of his birthday, we will donate much needed funds, and spread the love.

lender.name: Tezalea
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student.... in my first year of study in Architecture

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Someone gave me a gift certificate and now I have added more to my account. I love the idea of being able to help small businesses in parts of the world where the banking system may not be able to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I work on building websites and online ad campaigns for (usually) large companies like: Sony Pictures, Toyota, Coke, Pepsi, and AT&T.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people through healthcare awareness
